DOC.brief_summary: Philips Healthcare has added a virtual path planner to the current commercially available XperGuide software platform and that has the potential to significantly reduce dose during image-guided needle interventions.
DOC.brief_title: Virtual Path Planning for Image-guided Needle Interventions
DOC.detailed_description: The investigational device is used for image guidance by virtually planned path and X-ray data.
DOC.criteria: Patients at any age who are referred for a clinically indicated XperGuide interventional procedure. The informed consent has been signed by the participant, parent or legal guardian as appropriate. Pregnant patients.
